articles.author: Laurence Norman, Georgi Kantchev
articles.title: EU Support Grows for Russia Oil Ban Over Ukraine War - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: As Moscow’s assault continues with no peace deal in sight, European capitals consider a move that was once off the table
articles.content: Support for a European Union-wide ban on the purchase of Russian oil is growing inside the bloc, according to diplomats involved in the discussion, representing a significant shift in the continents … [+192 chars]

articles.author: Alex Alderson
articles.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3i: European pricing for Intel Core i5-12450H and Intel Arc A370M model emerges - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Lenovo introduced the IdeaPad Gaming 3i last month, but a retailer has revealed how much the 15-inch laptop will cost with an Intel Core i5-12450H processor and an Intel Arc A370M GPU. Units are not expected to begin shipping until late May though, two months…
articles.content: The Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3i has landed on Amazon Germany two months ahead of schedule. Referred to by Amazon as the IdeaPad Gaming 3, the IdeaPad Gaming 3i debuted last month at MWC 2022 in Barcelon… [+1109 chars]

articles.author: Megan Henney
articles.title: White House to meet with top oil, bank CEOs on Russian sanctions - Fox Business
articles.description: Top Biden administration officials will meet on Monday with executives from banks, oil companies and other firms to discuss the impact from the Russia-Ukraine war and the ensuing sanctions from the U.S. and its European allies.
